title: Shinuhodo Suki
sinopse:
A collection of one-shots with continuation from Dare ga Omae wo Suki dato Itta.

1. Shinuhodo Suki
2. Suki sugide Kirai (continuation of "Shinuhodo Suki")
3. 10 jyuu Nen Omedetou Manga

4. Akegarasu
   A story of the awkward beginnings of an intimate relationship between the boss of a large business, Yoshimura, and a young and handsome male employee called Sakura. Through this brief oneshot, they discover each other's true personality and find out that they are no so different from one another. (Source: MangaUpdates)

5. Yume no Awayuki (continuation of "Akegarasu")
6. Aokute Gomen
7. Onna ni Shika Wakaranai
8. Ai ga Doushita
